name: Buy Ground for Office
description: Handles all steps related to identifying, evaluating, and purchasing land for a new office, with legal, financial, and environmental checks.

steps.name: Define Office Needs and Budget
steps.action: Estimate future office requirements and allocate preliminary budget

steps.name: Search and Shortlist Land Plots
steps.action: Use real estate networks or agencies to find matching land offers

steps.name: Optional: Zoning and Urban Plan Check
steps.action: Confirm the landâ€™s zoning aligns with office construction

steps.name: Optional: Environmental Risk Assessment
steps.action: Check for contamination, flooding, or ecological constraints

steps.name: Hire Real Estate Lawyer or Legal Advisor
steps.action: Assign someone to oversee contracts, title check, and compliance

steps.name: Make Initial Offer to Seller
steps.action: Negotiate and present formal offer with conditions

steps.name: Optional: Internal Approval
steps.action: Route proposal to board or expansion committee for approval

steps.name: Review and Sign Purchase Agreement
steps.action: Lawyer validates documents and final signatures are collected

steps.name: Register Land Purchase and Notify Finance
steps.action: Ensure legal registration and internal documentation
